# Master Flask & REST APIs!

üåê **Flask** is a lightweight web framework for building APIs.

## Flask Basics
```python
from flask import Flask, jsonify, request

app = Flask(__name__)

@app.route('/api/players', methods=['GET'])
def get_players():
    return jsonify([{'id': 1, 'name': 'Hero'}])

@app.route('/api/players', methods=['POST'])
def create_player():
    data = request.json
    return jsonify(data), 201

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(debug=True)
```

## RESTful Design
- GET /api/players - List all
- GET /api/players/1 - Get one
- POST /api/players - Create
- PUT /api/players/1 - Update
- DELETE /api/players/1 - Delete
